title: The Best Rosters in Football With Daniel Jeremiah. Plus, the Best Non-quarterbacks in Football With Trey Wingo
description:
This week on the Ringer NFL Show, Kevin Clark is joined by Daniel Jeremiah from NFL Network and Amazon Prime Thursday Night Football to discuss the best open GM jobs in the league (1:30). They also talk about the upcoming 2021 NFL draft (7:00), the best rosters in football (17:40), and more. Later on, Kevin checks in with Norah Princiotti and 'Half-Forgotten History' host Trey Wingo to discuss the Ravens-Steelers game (31:50) and the best non-quarterbacks in football (34:00).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Daniel Jeremiah, Norah Princiotti and Trey Wingo
